headline: Interpublic Schedules First Quarter 2025 Earnings Release
summary: New York, NY, April 10, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Interpublic Group (NYSE: IPG) today announced that it will release earnings for the first quarter ended March 31, 2025 on the morning of April 24, 2025. Following the release, the company will hold a conference call for investors at 8:30 a.m. Eastern Time on the same day to review results. To join the conference call, please call (888) 790-3345.
